title: Beautiful Little lake
text: Battle ground Lake is a very peaceful place for a quiet walk in the fall or early spring. It tends to get a bit to busy and noisy for me in the summer when lots of kids are swimming and hanging out at the beach area. I'm glad that its enjoyed by so many, I just prefer the quieter times.

title: Awesome Hotel
text: The Adrian Hotel was great, the room was very clean and well stocked with Drinks and snacks. The TV had a ton of channels and the view from the balcony was great. Price was fair and I would stay there again.

title: Dinner
text: I have been here several times and the food is always fresh and delicious. The service is a bit slow but I have to say it's probably just because they stay so busy. The views of the river are relaxing and I enjoyed sitting on the patio near the woid fire. We will surely dine there again soon.

title: Dinner
text:
I was looking for some good fresh authentic Greece food here. I happen to drive by this place so I thought I would give it a try. I ordered a chicken Gyro and they made it just like the ones I ate in Athens,  absolutely delicious!!
The greek fries are super yummy too!
 It was all amazing and the Girls working were so friendly, they made my order fresh in under 5 minutes. This place is delicious and I will be back soon!!
Also the restaurant was spotless and smelled great!! 
$$ price were fair and well worth it!

title: Acropolis
text: The weather was perfect and the views of Athens were amazing. I loved all the signage explaining tge history. It was not at all crowded and I had great Wi-Fi from up top. I thoroughly enjoyed my visit and learned alot.

title: Dinner
text: Great service, food was fresh and delicious. Large portion couldn't finish it all. Wait staff was very accommodating and even sat and talked with me about my vacation.
